nodes.text: The planet Bromlarch was host to a planetary aqueduct system, which provided food and water to its host world. Galactic Republic Senators Padmé Amidala of Naboo and Rush Clovis of Scipio had three nights to prepare a Senate hearing in order to save Bromlarch's aqueduct system. Their hearing saved Bromlarch's aqueduct system, and thus saved Bromlarch's inhabitants from experiencing drought and famine.
